application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-200764cf-7fff-9d49-a8f5-49b2343ba3d0"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt;">The proposed front lightwells, by reason of their size, scale and prominent location, would comprise incongruous and discordant features, which are uncharacteristic and would harm the established character and appearance of the locally listed building, adjoining terrace and Victoria Park Conservation Area, of which it forms part.&nbsp; The proposal is therefore deemed contrary to London Plan (2021) Policy HC1 (Heritage Conservation and Growth); and policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character), LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) and LP4 (Non Designated Heritage) of Hackney Local Development Plan (LP33) (2020),&nbsp; the NPPF, the Council's Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementation Planning Document (2009) and Victorian Park Conservation Area Appraisal (2012).<br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-9c28565a-7fff-c493-522a-106f94788f7a"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The proposed lower ground floor extension, by reason of its scale, massing and depth, would comprise an overbearing and unsympathetic addition to the locally</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"> listed building, wider terrace and the Victorian Park Conservation Area, of which it forms part. The proposal fails to preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the Conservation Area and is therefore deemed contrary to London Plan (2021) Policy HC1 (Heritage conservation and growth); and policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character), LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) and LP4 (Non Designated Heritage) of Hackney Local Development Plan (LP33) (2020); and the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementation Planning Document (2009) and Victorian Park Conservation Area Appraisal (2012).</span></p>
description: Construction of enlarged lower ground floor level, and rear extensions at lower and ground floor levels, installation of two front-garden light-wells, new boundary treatment, along with re-cladding of existing rear dormer window and installation of two roof-lights in the front roof slope. Installation of air source heat pumps within rear garden and photovoltaic panels to flat top section of rear roof dormer and addition of three roof lights to flat top section of rear roof dormer.Linked cases: APP/U5360/D/22/3304626
